Class AbstractFiscalPacket

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.taliter.fiscal.device.hasar.AbstractFiscalPacket
All Implemented Interfaces:
FiscalPacket, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HasarFiscalPacket
public abstract class AbstractFiscalPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements FiscalPacket

An abstract base class for FiscalPacket implementations.

See Also:
